name: Old School RockPaperShotgun
description: I tried to recreate the old red/black look of RPS on my particular desktop. I'll try to improve it over time, but for now it works on the homepage and article views. All other pages may or may not work, mobile may be a complete disaster. I'm aware the admin screens are a bit borked.
additional_info: The version at https://openusercss.org/theme/5b565f51ce856b0b0068dc83 should be regarded as canonical, and will be updated first.
